layout.name: swoopSpeedX
layout.title: Horizontal Swoop Speed
layout.tooltip: How far in terms of horizontal speed will the konotako fly towards?

layout.name: swoopSpeedY
layout.title: Vertical Swoop Speed
layout.tooltip: How low in terms of vertical speed will the konotako swoop down towards?

layout.name: initWaitTime
layout.title: Wait Time
layout.tooltip: How many ticks/frames does the konotako wait before swooping down?
